title: FOCUS
content: The FOCUS trial investigated whether a liberal or restrictive transfusion threshold affected outcomes in patients undergoing hip fracture surgery with cardiovascular risk factors.

title: TRICC
content: The TRICC trial compared restrictive vs liberal transfusion strategies in critically ill patients to evaluate 30-day mortality.

title: PROPPR
content: PROPPR compared 1:1:1 vs 1:1:2 ratios of plasma, platelets, and RBCs in trauma patients predicted to require massive transfusion.

title: DRASTIC
content: The DRASTIC trial evaluated percutaneous vs surgical drainage of infected pancreatic necrosis.

title: REACT-2
content: The REACT-2 trial assessed immediate whole-body CT vs standard imaging in trauma patients to evaluate mortality and morbidity.

title: COST
content: The COST trial compared laparoscopic-assisted colectomy to open colectomy for colon cancer.

title: CROSS
content: The CROSS trial examined neoadjuvant chemoradiotherapy followed by surgery vs surgery alone for esophageal or gastroesophageal junction cancer.

title: STITCH
content: The STITCH trial compared small-bite vs large-bite fascial closure techniques to prevent incisional hernias.

title: STOP-IT
content: STOP-IT compared fixed 4-day vs longer-duration antibiotics after source control of intraabdominal infection.

title: DIVERTI
content: The DIVERTI trial assessed Hartmann’s procedure vs primary anastomosis with diverting ileostomy in perforated diverticulitis.

title: LUNG
content: This trial compared lobectomy vs wedge resection for small, early-stage non–small cell lung cancer.

title: AAA
content: This trial compared open surgical repair vs endovascular repair (EVAR) for abdominal aortic aneurysm.

title: BARI
content: The STAMPEDE trial showed bariatric surgery improves diabetes control over medical therapy alone.

title: SPLENIC
content: Explored operative vs nonoperative management of blunt splenic trauma.

title: MESH
content: Evaluated biologic vs synthetic mesh use in hiatal hernia repair.

title: NASCET
content: The NASCET trial compared carotid endarterectomy vs medical therapy for symptomatic carotid stenosis.

title: PACIFIC
content: Looked at postoperative strategies after pancreaticoduodenectomy.

title: MANGLED
content: Reexamined the utility of the Mangled Extremity Severity Score in trauma-related limb salvage.

title: INTRAVASCULAR ULTRASOUND
content: Compared ultrasound vs landmark technique for central line placement.

title: ESOPHAGEAL PERFORATION
content: Examined management of penetrating esophageal injuries.

title: COLON
content: Assessed early vs delayed surgery in colon cancer and the impact of neoadjuvant treatment.

title: HERNIA
content: Analyzed suture technique for fascial closure and rates of hernia recurrence.

title: NECROSE
content: Step-up vs open approach in necrotizing pancreatitis.

title: HEMOTHORAX
content: Management of retained post-traumatic hemothorax.

title: HEADTRAUMA
content: Children at low risk of brain injuries after head trauma.

title: ULCERATIVE COLITIS
content: Ulcerative colitis and colorectal cancer relationship.

title: B-32
content: Sentinel lymph node biopsy and breast cancer trial.

title: RADIATION STS
content: Adjuvant radiation in extremity soft tissue sarcoma.
